channel.title: Comments on: Luxury cave living in Cappadocia

item.title: By: Sarah Duff » 10 things I loved about magical Cappadocia

item.description: [...] hotel. I loved the beautiful old antiques and traditional kilms with incredible hilltop views at Taskonaklar in Uchisar, and the funky modern furniture and a tranquil setting in one of Cappaodcia’s [...]
